entities.name: rita skeeter
entities.description: Rita Skeeter is mentioned as a second cousin of someone. She left her cousin's house to go south and see an aunt, but seems to have vanished without trace.

entities.name: bertha jorkins
entities.description: Bertha Jorkins is mentioned in the context of goblings, but no further information is provided.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and is being spoken to by Bagman. He is asked about his progress with a golden egg.

entities.name: bagman
entities.description: Bagman is speaking to Harry and offering to help him in the tournament.

entities.name: goblings
entities.description: Goblings are mentioned as something that Bagman and Harry were discussing before switching topics.

entities.name: golden egg
entities.description: The golden egg is an object that Harry is working on in the tournament.

relationships.description: Bagman offers to help Harry in the tournament, specifically by providing a 'prod in the right direction'.
Rita Skeeter is going to visit her aunt.
